Projects.title: Projects
Projects.subtitle: Some of my most notable projects.
Projects.description: Explore my latest projects and discover my evolution as a programmer through innovative solutions tailored to each challenge.

mahalo.title: Mahalo Cabins
mahalo.description: Official website for the Mahalo Cabins complex, located in Villa Rumipal, Córdoba.

sectionDescription.title: Description
sectionDescription.description: The Cabañas Mahalo website was designed to provide an informative and visually appealing experience for visitors. A photo gallery was implemented to showcase the beauty of the complex, along with video links highlighting the surroundings and facilities, as well as interactive maps to make locating the property easier. Additionally, a booking system was integrated, allowing customers to manage their stays effortlessly. Google ratings were also incorporated, reflecting guest reviews directly on the site to build trust in the service. This project combines functionality and design to enhance Cabañas Mahalo's digital presence.

nike.title: Nike Max Play 2024
nike.description: Official agenda for the Nike Max Play 2024 event held in Chile and Peru.

sectionDescription.title: Description
sectionDescription.description: This project is the official agenda for the Nike Max Play 2024 event held in Chile and Peru. It includes a login system that allows access with the universal password airmax2024 and any username. Once inside, users can explore an interactive menu with two main sections: the complete schedule of event activities and exclusive promotional brochures for Chile and Peru. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this project stands out for its simple and intuitive design, aimed at providing a smooth experience and highlighting Nike's innovative energy.

bouquet.description: Official website for the Bouquets complex, located in Villa Rumipal, Córdoba.

sectionDescription.title: Description
sectionDescription.description: The Cabañas Mahalo website was designed to provide an informative and visually appealing experience for visitors. Google ratings were also incorporated, reflecting guest reviews directly on the site to build trust in the service. This project combines functionality and design to enhance Cabañas Mahalo's digital presence.

card1.comment: The development team created a fast and easy-to-use web app that exceeded all my expectations. Their professionalism was key.
card1.name: Oscar Biocca

card2.comment: The experience was excellent. Our website is visually appealing and offers flawless navigation. Highly recommended.

card3.comment: The backend solution they provided is solid and secure. The team's attention to detail is impressive. Great job!

card4.name: Martín Pascual

card5.comment: They developed an elegant and easy-to-manage website. The result was more than we expected. Very satisfied with their work.

card6.comment: The backend development they provided is scalable and robust. A professional service that met all our expectations.

card7.comment: Thanks to the team, our web app is fast and reliable. Their problem-solving ability is unmatched. We highly recommend them.

Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.subtitle: Answers to your most common questions.

1.question: Do you offer maintenance and post-development support services?
1.answer: Yes, I provide ongoing maintenance and support to ensure that the application or website continues to function optimally. This includes security updates, performance improvements, and the implementation of new features.

2.question: Do you have experience working on large projects and collaborating with teams?
2.answer: I have worked on projects of various sizes, from individual applications to complex enterprise platforms. In teams, I use tools like Git, Jira, and Slack to collaborate efficiently with other developers, designers, and project managers.

3.question: Can you integrate APIs and third-party services into my applications?
3.answer: Of course, I have experience integrating external APIs such as payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal), authentication services (OAuth, JWT), and other RESTful or GraphQL APIs to enhance the functionality of applications.

4.question: How long does it take to develop an application or website?
4.answer: The time varies depending on the complexity of the project and its requirements. A basic project can take between 2 to 4 weeks, while a more complex system may require several months. I always provide a detailed plan and estimated timelines after discussing the requirements.

5.question: Do you offer design services or do you only focus on development?
5.answer: While I specialize in development, I collaborate with professional designers to ensure that the products have an attractive and functional design. I also have basic knowledge of tools like Figma and Adobe XD, which allows me to work directly on simple designs.

6.question: What are your rates?
6.answer: My rates depend on the type and complexity of the project. I offer hourly rates or fixed-price budgets based on the specific needs of each client. After an initial consultation, I provide a clear cost breakdown.
